titles.title: A resolution designating October 2011 as "Filipino American History Month".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 10/5/2011--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates October 2011 as Filipino American History Month. Recognizes the celebration of Filipino American History Month as a study of the advancement of Filipino Americans and a time of remembrance of the many contributions Filipino Americans have made to the United States. Urges the people of the United States to observe Filipino American History Month with appropriate programs and activities.
